scripts.say: (My sister once sailed across this same ocean... It must have been just as freezing back then...)
... Vessels of an unknown identification signal detected at 12 o'clock. They are rapidly approaching.
T-they're enemies we've never encounter before?
They must be the new models the Eagle Union warned us about. They indiscriminately open fire on any passing vessel... They are extremely troublesome, indeed.
With the second convoy en route, we cannot simply ignore this threat.
All units, enter battle formations! Let us show our enemies the courage of the Royal Navy!
